originalText.text: Emily has been so wonderful in helping me launch my own business. I don't have to worry at all when she does my business taxes. What's more, she's always my go to person when I need to consult about business planning, growth strategy, tax planning etc. (as basic as LLC vs S Corp). She's also very knowledgeable about personal tax, IRAs, 401ks etc.  She's my one stop shop! highly recommend !

text.text: Emily has been so wonderful in helping me launch my own business. I don't have to worry at all when she does my business taxes. What's more, she's always my go to person when I need to consult about business planning, growth strategy, tax planning etc. (as basic as LLC vs S Corp). She's also very knowledgeable about personal tax, IRAs, 401ks etc.  She's my one stop shop! highly recommend !

originalText.text: Emily helped me with IRS notice response. She is very professional and easy to work with. She is very thorough, knowledgeable and experienced in dealing with IRS. She guided me to gather the support and evidence to provide as a proper response. I would highly recommend her service.

text.text: Emily helped me with IRS notice response. She is very professional and easy to work with. She is very thorough, knowledgeable and experienced in dealing with IRS. She guided me to gather the support and evidence to provide as a proper response. I would highly recommend her service.

originalText.text:
Very patient and experienced CPA, recommended to many friends of mine! Affordable price with detailed consultation, Emily is definitely the one I want to reach out for both tax advisory as well as personal financial management!

Before, I was so shocked by the complexity of stock compensation and donation deductible for my first tax year and now I feel so safe with Emily for filing my tax and answering all the tax questions!

originalText.text: Emily professionally analyzed my tax issues and provided me with helpful suggestions. I plan to change to Riverside Alpha CPA for my future personal tax. Highly recommended!

text.text: Emily professionally analyzed my tax issues and provided me with helpful suggestions. I plan to change to Riverside Alpha CPA for my future personal tax. Highly recommended!

originalText.text: Everything about my experience with Riverside Alpha CPA was positive, from the consult with Emily to the filing process. Highly responsive and clear communication, personalized and detailed execution, and good value for the time I saved.
